_comment: Figma MCP server configuration for Claude Code agents.
FIGMA_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN must be set in the runtime environment.
Never hardcode the token value in this file.
- This config is read by Claude Code (claude_desktop_config.json) or
- The Figma MCP server exposes read-only Figma context (files, components,
variables, annotations) to agents. Agents MUST NOT write to Figma files.
- All agent tool calls must emit to ops.run_events (see ssot boundary rules).
